title: Champagne Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Champagne Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Sugar cube
Angostura
or
Peychaud's bitters
Dry Champagne
or other
sparkling wine
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Place the sugar cube on a small saucer and douse with two or three dashes of bitters. Place the sugar in the bottom of a
champagne glass
, and fill with sparkling wine (careful—the sugar will make the wine foam, so go slow). Twist a piece of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Special equipment
Champagne flute
